meanings.definition: Oompahed (verb): past tense of oompah - to play a rhythmic accompaniment on a brass instrument
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, the band oompahed joyfully at the parade.
meanings.sent2: The musicians oompahed loudly during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The elephant oompahed along with the marching band, adding a unique touch to the performance.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the brass instruments oompahed through the air, filling the room with energy.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the music oompahed in the background, creating a festive atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Oompahed (adjective): characterized by a strong, repetitive brass accompaniment
meanings.sent1: The oompahed music echoed through the hall, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent2: The festival had an oompahed atmosphere with brass bands playing all around.
meanings.sent3: The oompahed tunes made everyone want to dance along.
meanings.sent4: The oompahed rhythm was so infectious that it stayed in your mind long after the performance.
meanings.sent5: The oompahed melodies filled the street, drawing people in with their lively beat.

meanings.definition: Oompahed (adverb): in a manner resembling the rhythmic sound of a brass instrument
meanings.sent1: The music played oompahed, creating a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: She danced oompahed to the lively brass band tunes.
meanings.sent3: The children laughed and played oompahed in the park.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled oompahed through the trees, sounding like a distant brass ensemble.
meanings.sent5: The crowd clapped oompahed along with the beat, enjoying the lively performance.
